content: As an AI language model, I don’t have personal experiences or emotions to enjoy any particular album or music. However, "folklore" by Taylor Swift has been widely praised for its introspective and nostalgic lyrics along with its dreamy, indie-folk sound. Swift worked with Aaron Dessner of The National and Jack Antonoff to create the album in secret over the course of a few months during the COVID-19 pandemic. It was released in July 2020 and quickly became a critical and commercial success, debuting at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 and receiving numerous accolades and nominations. Many fans and critics noted that "folklore" marked a distinct departure from Swift's previous pop-oriented work and ushered in a new era of artistry for the singer.
